definitions.text: cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations
examples: Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me
It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves
feeling nettled from the constant teasing
felt really pissed at her snootiness
riled no end by his lies

definitions.text: troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances
examples: her poor pestered father had to endure her constant interruptions
the vexed parents of an unruly teenager
